title: Beautiful Life
resume:
Beautiful Life is a drama of "Toshiba Nichiyo Gekijo" on TBS Television. It was first shown in Japan from 16 January to 26 March 2000.
Beautiful Life is a massive success, and holds the TV rating record of drama in Japan over the 30 years.
